casebody.data:
In re SMEDLEY. (Supreme Court, General Term, Fourth Department. February 15, 1894.) In the matter of the' accounting of Cornelius A. Smedley, as guardian of Anna Van Burén, an infant.

■ Argued before HARDIN, -P. Jv and MARTIN and MERWIN, JJ.

No opinion. Decree modified by deducting .from the award $40.85 for .commissions, and, as so modified, affirmed, without costs of the appeal to either party.
